name: Shortling Federations
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Combat Shield (Bash (A1), Shielded)

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

spells.name: Lore of Protection
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Safety Gear Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Apparition of Doom
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Quake.

spells.name: Lore of Terror
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which get -1 to morale test rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? this.getMoraleCost({ ...unit, quality: Math.max(1, unit.quality - params.effect.rollModifier.value) }) - this.getMoraleCost(unit) : 0

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getMoraleCost({ quality: 5 - params.effect.rollModifier.value }) - this.getMoraleCost({ quality: 5 })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Dome of Doom
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

spells.name: Lore of Bravery
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Fearless once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Pike of Doom
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 6", which take 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3) each.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Precision Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get +1 to hit rolls in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Quake
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Safety Gear
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away, they get +1 to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Devastating Frenzy
specialRules.description: Place one marker on this unit when it fully destroys an enemy unit. For each marker all models with this rule in this unit get AP(+1) and +1 to defense rolls until the end of the game (up to a max. of +2).

specialRules.name: Rending when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Rending when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Regeneration Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Regeneration. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Safety Gear Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Safety Gear Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Teleport Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Teleport. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Morale Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which gets -1 to morale test rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Ignores Regeneration
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Rending
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+4).

specialRules.name: Safety Gear Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Safety Gear, they always get +1 to defense rolls from Safety Gear (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, place this model anywhere fully within 6" of its position.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.
